solution_line_template: First find the total number of antacids Nancy takes after eating Indian food per week: {antacids_indian_per_day} antacids/day * {indian_days_per_week} days/week = <<{antacids_indian_per_day}*{indian_days_per_week}={antacids_indian_per_week}>>{antacids_indian_per_week} antacids/week

Then find the total number of antacids Nancy takes after eating Mexican food per week: {antacids_mexican_per_day} antacids/day * {mexican_days_per_week} days/week = <<{antacids_mexican_per_day}*{mexican_days_per_week}={antacids_mexican_per_week}>>{antacids_mexican_per_week} antacids/week

Then find the number of days she doesn't eat Indian food or Mexican food: {days_in_week} days/week - {indian_days_per_week} days/week - {mexican_days_per_week} days/week = {other_days_per_week} days/week

Then find the total number of antacids Nancy takes per week: {antacids_indian_per_week} antacids/week + {antacids_mexican_per_week} antacids/week + {antacids_other_per_week} antacids/week = <<{antacids_indian_per_week}+{antacids_mexican_per_week}+{antacids_other_per_week}={total_antacids_per_week}>>{total_antacids_per_week} antacids/week

Then multiply her weekly antacid consumption by the number of weeks per month to find her monthly consumption: {total_antacids_per_week} antacids/week * {weeks_per_month} week/month = <<{total_antacids_per_week}*{weeks_per_month}={total_antacids_per_month}>>{total_antacids_per_month} antacids/month
